basics.name: Jorge Alejandro Vargas Martinez
basics.label: Ruby on Rails Web Developer
basics.summary: I am a senior in University. Software engineer student of Telematics School of the University of Colima. My favorite branch of software development is web development. I am very passionate about everything related and I like to learn a lot about it, like learning new tools, techniques and good practices. The practical experience that I currently have developing software I got it by developing some projects at the university as part of my subjects and also the experience within the Brightcoders Academy. I can finally say that I am a person who likes challenges, problem solving and hard work.

work.summary: I worked developing a web application for the association of 'Donadores Compulsivos' using Ruby on Rails, Sass and Javascript.  I worked on both the backend and the frontend. I also worked on creating an api to serve services to a mobile application.
highlights: Started working on my first real project with a client, working on a company

work.summary: I developed the backend part for Patient Tracking Platform for the CRREAD of Colima. CRREAD is an association that helps people with drug addiction and alcoholism problems. The platform helps in the patient treatment processes.
highlights: Started working with a real client

work.summary: I developed a simple Virtual Assistant with DialogFlow and PHP that showed information about the careers of a University. The work I did was to classify the JSON data received from DialogFlow in PHP to get data from a database to generate answers for the assistant.
